content: knitted head band neck warmer and mittens in drops alaska piece is worked with cables and increase for saddle shoulders see the winter wisp headband pattern here 1 see the mittens pattern here 2 drops design pattern x-450 yarn group c or a + a * **for the entire set ** **size** s/m - l/xl **materials** drops alaska 350-400 g colour 03 light grey * **neck warmer ** **size** s/m - l/xl measurements length approx 32-34 cm measured after rib in the neck shoulder width approx 34 - 39 cm **materials** drops alaska 200-200 g colour 03 light grey **knitting gauge** 18 stitches in width and 23 row vertically in stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm needles drops circular needle size 5 5 mm length 60 cm for stocking stitch drops circular needle size 4 5 mm length 40 cm for rib needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to a larger needle size if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to a smaller needle size 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/214-49-a-winter-wisps-headband 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/214-49-c-winter-wisps-mittens
